ygData.subject: Re: Rallos Zek
ygData.msgSnippet: That s a good way to do it but also there s a difference between Spider Silks and Spiderling Silks. I d buy a stack of Spider Silks for 1pp a stack. I wouldn t
ygData.messageBody:
That's a good way to do it but also there's a
difference between Spider Silks and Spiderling Silks. I'd
buy a stack of Spider Silks for 1pp a stack. I
wouldn't offer anything for Spiderling Silks. It'd be
easier on me to just farm those. Two hits and
splat...they're gone and almost always drop one or two silks.
<br><br>Jewelry is going to be highly expensive and not very
profitable till you've dumped in a lot of plat though. After
that though, the skill more than makes up for the slow
start.<br><br>As far as baking, afraid there's not much market for
them. However, there are some good items you can bake.
Forget the recipies but if you look in on
www.eqtraders.com <br><br>You will find a WEALTH of trade skill
info.<br><br>You can bake wedding cakes, bday cakes and best of
all-- Stat increasing items as well as light fluffy
pastries that last forever for you overburdened monk
friends that have neglected baking (for shame monks. Fish
rolls are you best banquet .1 stone items... I think.
LOL. My trick is to eat cheap stuff and load the first
food slot with stat increasers).<br><br>shooman
out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic of the Drinal server.<br>The Tribunal
of the Antiquties
